content: not your nana s yarnwork winston the willy- amigurumi penis pattern abbreviations ● st = stitch or stitches ● single_crochet = single_crochet ● 2sc = increase ● f/o = fasten_off supplies needed ● 4mm hook ● worsted weight yarn in tan peach and dark peach or colors of your choice ● darning needle ● polyester fiberfill ● 6mm safety eyes ● pink fabric paint & paintbrush who knew genitalia could be so cute meet winston the adorable crochet willy or penis knob ding ding dong schlong dick prick- whatever you want to call him he doesn t mind with this pattern you get to make your own winston heck make an army of winstons- we need more adorable crochet penises in the world this should be a relatively easy pattern for crocheters of any level but there is a bit of sewing and you must be able to read your stitches your finished willy will measure approximately 5 ½ inches tall as always i recommend reading this pattern through before beginning you are welcome to make as many penises as you wish for yourself friends or family using this pattern you are also welcome to sell them so long as i am credited for the design do not sell or reproduce this pattern designed and written by crystal mihaylo pickrel - not your nana s yarnwork - 2019 - all rights reserved 1 winston the willy pattern head using peach yarn round 1 5sc in magic_ring pull tight 5 round 2 2sc in each st 10 round 3 *single_crochet in 1 st 2sc in next st* repeat around 15 round 4 *single_crochet in 2 st 2sc in next st* repeat around 20 f/o make another and leave a longer tail on the second one for sewing take the 2 circles you just made and sew them together with the insides facing out sew into 12 stitches from each circle leaving the rest exposed once you re finished sewing turn right side out keep the tail for sewing the head to the shaft count the stitches you have remaining at the bottom of the head there should be 16 set aside and begin making the shaft designed and written by crystal mihaylo pickrel - not your nana s yarnwork - 2019 - all rights reserved 2 winston the willy pattern shaft using tan yarn round 1 5sc in magic_ring pull tight 5 round 2 2sc in each st 10 round 3 *single_crochet in 1 st 2sc in next* repeat around 15 rounds 4-10 single_crochet in each st 15 now is a good time to sew the head to the shaft place the head on top of the shaft and sew it on working only into the inside loops of the last row of the head you will be working single crochets into the outside loops next so leave them exposed take your time to make sure the head is sewn on neatly and straight the upper most loops should be sewn
